glAccountName.description:
Name of the account in your general ledger.

Field only available if you have Zuora Finance enabled. Maximum of 255 characters.

glAccountNumber.description:
Account number in your general ledger.

Field only available if you have Zuora Finance enabled. Maximum of 255 characters.

name.description:
Name of the accounting code.

Accounting code name must be unique. Maximum of 100 characters.

type.description:
Accounting code type. You cannot change the type of an accounting code from `AccountsReceivable` to a different type. 

Note that `On-Account Receivable` is only available if you enable the Invoice Settlement feature.

additionalProperties.description: Custom fields of the Accounting Code object. The name of each custom field has the form *customField*__c. Custom field names are case sensitive. See [Manage Custom Fields](https://knowledgecenter.zuora.com/BB_Introducing_Z_Business/Manage_Custom_Fields) for more information.

allOf.description: Container for custom fields of an Accounting Code object.
allOf.title: accountingCodeFieldsCustom
